text: Segundo Tuculet (born 5 February 1994) is an Argentine rugby union player who currently plays for Ealing Trailfinders in the English RFU Championship. He has spent most of career playing sevens rugby with the Argentine national team. In 15-man rugby union, he has played for the in the international Super Rugby competition and also for Los Tilos in the Torneo de la URBA in his native Argentina. ==Super Rugby== Tuculet played one match for the Jaguares during the 2016 Super Rugby season. Starting as an outside-centre, he was replaced after 58 minutes and didn't feature again during the campaign. ==International career== Tuculet represented Argentina internationally at rugby sevens in 2014 and 2015 competing in seven World Rugby Sevens Series events. ==Super Rugby Statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; line-height:90%; font-size:95%; width:60%;" |- !
